application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: To remove Two Conifers within Woodland 26 on TPO 1
decision_conditions: The two conifers are situated within the rear garden. Collectively they have a moderate amenity value and contribute to the arboreal character of the local area, providing a screen between properties in Enstone road and Three Oaks Close.

The applicant wishes to remove the trees to avoid long term issues however they have provided no details as to what these issues are and why they are considered unacceptable. Allowing this work without proper rational could lead to a president in premature tree felling.
Having regard to the reasons given for the proposed work, the work is unjustified and will have a detrimental impact on the visual amenity and arboreal character of the area.
The removal of deadwood, dangerous / hanging branches and ivy:  This does not require the formal consent of the Council.
